description: red ground; gibbon in a gold tree on one side, black bear climbing same tree on opposite side, with pair of bear cubs in a knot hole at bottom of tree on one side; green silk cord; cage-form ojime with tiny lizard inside; unsigned
medium: Lacquer (takamaki-e, hiramaki-e, nashiji), gold; ojime: shakudo; silk cord
title: Four-case inro decorated with Asiatic black bear and gibbon; ojime of a cage with movable lizzard
